metadata.title: RA Family: Does MMF (Memory Mirror Function) work for DMA or DTC?

sections.content:
Question:
Does MMF (Memory Mirror Function) work for DMA or DTC?
Answer:
No. MMF only changes the memory address to the mirror address when CPU accesses the memory. The function does not work for a memory access by the other bus masters such as DMA, DTC. Therefore, it is necessary to avoid assigning memory mirror addresses to areas accessed by those peripherals.
Suitable Products
RA and FSP
